ingredients: 4 packets of jelly , in different colours or sachets of vege-gel (see tip)
400 g ripe red strawberries , hulled and sliced
1 tablespoon vanilla sugar , or a few drops of vanilla extract
a few sprigs fresh mint , to serve
2 tablespoons vanilla sugar or caster sugar
1 sprig fresh rosemary , leaves picked and very finely chopped
1 sprig fresh sage , leaves picked and very finely chopped
½ a bunch of fresh chives
½ a bunch of fresh parsley
2 litres organic chicken or vegetable stock
200 g watercress , washed and spun dry
1 red onion , peeled and finely sliced
4 large (halved) or 8 small (roughly 480g in total) flat-fish fillets, such as plaice, lemon sole, megrim, dab , skin off, pin-boned, from sustainable sources
½ a a mug of plain flour
½ a a bunch of fresh mint
¼ of a bunch of fresh flat-leaf parsley
1 small bunch fresh chives , finely chopped
125 g hot-smoked trout , from sustainable sources, ask your fishmonger, skin removed
a few sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley
1 small bunch fresh basil , leaves picked
400 g hot smoked salmon , from sustainable sources, ask your fishmonger
5 cm piece fresh root ginger , peeled and roughly chopped
400 g ripe seasonal fruit, such as mangos, plums, pears, blueberries
2 handfuls sweet ripe strawberries , preferably wild ones, hulled
400 g leftover vegetables , such as potatoes, carrots, turnips, Brussels sprouts
300 g gluten-free plain flour , plus extra for dusting (I used Doves Farm)
1 head of celery , plus inner yellow leaves
a few sprigs of fresh tarragon
500 g asparagus , woody ends snapped off
225 g unsalted butter (at room temperature) , plus extra for greasing
1½ tablespoon of icing sugar , plus extra for dusting
300 g golden caster sugar , plus extra for sprinkling
500 g mixed fresh berries , such as strawberries, raspberries and blackberries
1 vanilla pod , scored lengthways and seeds scraped out
a few small fresh mint leaves
3 large handfuls strawberries , preferably wild ones, hulled, washed and drained
125 g organic unsalted butter , at room temperature, plus extra for greasing
60 g organic or Fairtrade caster sugar
300 g rhubarb , trimmed and finely sliced
100 g good-quality dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)
½ bunch of fresh flat-leaf parsley
2 sheets of ready-rolled puff pastry , (640g) (we used Jus Rol)
100 g unsalted butter , cold, plus extra for greasing
200 g gluten-free plain flour , plus extra for dusting
½ a bunch of fresh thyme
200 g rasberries , (a mixture of red and golden, if available)
125 g butter , plus extra for greasing
1 vanilla pod , scored lengthways and seeds scraped
250 g unsalted butter , softened, plus extra for greasing
250 g self-raising flour , sifted, plus extra for dusting
½ vanilla pod , split lengthways and seeds scraped out
1 tablespoon icing sugar , plus extra for dusting
500 g plums and seasonal berries , plums destoned and halved
4 sprigs of fresh mint , plus extra leaves to decorate
1 handful fresh mint , very finely chopped
1 fat red chilli , deseeded and finely sliced, optional
3 sprigs fresh rosemary , leaves picked and chopped
1 kg quality shin of beef , ask the butcher to cut into 2.5cm dice and give you the bone
1.5 litres organic beef or chicken stock
50 g white caster sugar , or more if needed, depending on sweetness of rhubarb
1 vanilla pod , or ½ teaspoon vanilla extract
100 g golden caster sugar , plus extra for sprinkling
a few knobs of butter , for greasing
2 x 500 ml tubs of good-quality ice cream, vanilla and chocolate
300 g good-quality strawberry or raspberry jam
1 Crunchie or Dime bar or a bag of Maltesers , bashed up
½ a bunch of fresh chives
½ a bunch of fresh flat-leaf parsley
150 g dried fruit, such as sour cherries, raisins, sultanas, chopped sour apricots, blueberries, or a mixture
500 g self-raising flour , plus a little extra for dusting
4 tablespoons milk , plus a little extra for brushing
Jersey clotted cream, good-quality jam or lemon curd , to serve
300 g dairy-free margarine (suitable for baking) , plus extra for greasing
300 g gluten-free plain flour , plus extra for dusting
200 g icing sugar , plus extra for dusting
1 small pinch freshly ground black pepper
300 g smoked salmon , from sustainable sources, ask your fishmonger
200 g plain flour , plus extra for dusting
50 g caster sugar , plus extra for sprinkling over
30 g good-quality dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)
20 g lavender sugar (use only 25g caster sugar in the main ingredients when making this version)
½ a small bunch of fresh lemon thyme , leaves picked
a small bunch of fresh mint , leaves picked
a few sprigs of fresh thyme
500 g plain flour , plus extra for dusting
1.5 kg courgettes, a mixture of yellow and green if you can get them , finely sliced
a few sprigs fresh mint , leaves picked
250 g cold unsalted butter , cut into cubes
250 g plain flour , plus extra for dusting
125 g cold unsalted butter , cut into cubes
1 x 500 g block of ready-made puff pastry
1 handful of mixed, ripe cherry tomatoes
½ a bunch of fresh basil
1 good splash elderflower or blackcurrant cordial
800 g mixed summer berries, such as raspberries, redcurrants, strawberries, blackcurrants and blackberries
1 kg chopped mixed fruit , fresh or frozen
500 g self-raising flour , plus extra for dusting
75 g caster sugar , plus extra to serve
a couple of splashes of milk
1 heaped tablespoon caster sugar , plus extra for sprinkling
400 g fresh berries, such as raspberries, strawberries, blackberries
